mutants.original_line: distinct_signs_product = 1  # initial product of distinct signs
mutants.code:
def prod_signs(arr):
    if not arr:
        return None
    distinct_signs_product = 2
    distinct_absolute_sums = 0
    distinct_elements = set()
    for n in arr:
        if n == 0:
            return None
        absolute_value = abs(n)
        if absolute_value in distinct_elements:
            continue
        distinct_elements.add(absolute_value)
        sign = n / absolute_value
        distinct_signs_product *= sign
        distinct_absolute_sums += absolute_value
    return distinct_signs_product * distinct_absolute_sums

def prod_signs(arr):
    if not arr:
        return None
    distinct_signs_product = 1
    distinct_absolute_sums = 0
    distinct_elements = set()
    for n in arr:
        if n == 0:
            return None
        absolute_value = abs(n)

        distinct_signs_product *= sign
        distinct_absolute_sums -= absolute_value
    return distinct_signs_product * distinct_absolute_sums
